00007 # *** INCLUDE TRAILING SLASH ***
00008 # i.e. if your site is at http://getosimo.com/forums/
00009 #      then this value should be '/forums/'
00010 #      ~ OR ~
00011 #      if the forums are in the root URL directory, just put '/'

00021 # Currently Osimo only supports memcached as a caching method.
00022 #
00023 # If you do not have memcached installed with the memcache PEAR module, then set this to false.
00024 # Otherwise set it to 'memcache'
00025 define('CACHE_TYPE',false); // Possible values: 'memcache',false
00026 
00027 # Set this to any unique value if you are using more than 1 Osimo installation on the same
00028 # memcached server.  You might also consider setting this if this server is running other scripts
00029 # that use memcached, although the possibility of cross-script interference is extremely low.
00030 $memcachePrefix = '';
00031 
00032 # Enter the address of every memcached server you want Osimo to use in the array.
00033 # The value must be an array, even if you're only using 1 memcached server.
00034 $memcacheAddr = array(
00035  'localhost'
00036 );
00037 
00038 # The port memcached is running on. The default is 11211.
00039 $memcachePort = 11211;
00040
